title: Tell us your cheesiest League pickup lines!
body:
Are you looking for your next IRL duo partner? We asked the community for their best League-themed icebreakers and got a few that would thaw even Lissandra’s frozen heart! Check out some of the responses below and share some of your cheesiest, Phreak-worthy pickup lines-- but keep it PG, folks. :P

Also, don't forget to check out the *Love & League* documentary for some fun stories about couples who play League together.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lx_UCcK7Yo

(Pro-tip: Click the bottom right corner of the Vines to turn sound on/off!)


https://vine.co/v/eiWixID7PBL
**Vine by [Emmi Stonier](https://vine.co/v/eiWixID7PBL)**


https://vine.co/v/eeVDZUUWB2O
**Vine by [Tacocatzx](https://vine.co/v/eeVDZUUWB2O)**


https://vine.co/v/ee2gKJvmzEI
**Vine by [DoanDy](https://vine.co/v/ee2gKJvmzEI)**


https://vine.co/v/ee0hwIVxPYO
**Vine by [LeagueBoy](https://vine.co/v/ee0hwIVxPYO)**


https://vine.co/v/eeIWVEDZp3A
**Vine by [League of Thomas](https://vine.co/v/eeIWVEDZp3A)**

replies.body: dont you worry i got protection, windwall blocks all projections {{champion:157}}  ;)
Says the king of knock-ups -_-
{{champion:432}} *Seductive chiming *

{{champion:37}} 
*gets seduced*
I ship it.
but is bard +18???
I think bard is +1000
What if a teemo blinded a lee sin?

I have a poem by {{champion:64}}:
_Roses are black, violets are black, everything is black, I can't see_
You are my trinket, I can't go on without you.

Bronze Pick-Up Lines:

"You are my trinket, I'll never use you." <3

> that would thaw even Lissandra’s frozen heart! 

pls Lissandra doesn't even build frozen heart n00blord
Report Glyceroll for being toxic. T_T
https://understandingandfaith.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/its-only-logical-thumb.jpg?w=474
Ey gurl are you top lane because I wanna sit in your bush for five minutes before leaving us both disappointed when nothing happens, then shamefully slink away.

{{champion:41}} 
Are you an orange, because when i'm with you everything is K
I have a Varusmall penis :3

{{champion:74}} Are you a compound of Beryllium and Barium? Because you're a total BaBe.

Are you a {{champion:143}} main because you are de{{champion:143}} ble!

You must play {{champion:40}} because you're blowing me away.
haha i like this one man xD

> [{quoted}](name=JarecPlaysLOL,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25RrAhpg,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2015-07-02T20:19:13.278+0000)
>
> haha i like this one man xD

I wish I had a pair of {{item:3111}}  because you just stunned me.

{{champion:90}} I have Space Aids. Would you like to share them with me? 




.........................................


http://i41.tinypic.com/rbifls.gif

{{champion:53}} I bet I can find a way to pull you in, even with all those creeps around.
{{champion:245}} I don't need extra time to tell you that you're the one for me.
{{champion:26}} I knew you'd fall for me.
{{champion:126}} Here today to defend your tomorrow.
{{champion:222}} I may do crazy things, but it's all for you.
{{champion:32}} I never thought I'd get a friend like you...
{{champion:51}} I've got you in my sights, and I'm not letting go.
{{champion:4}} Today must be my lucky day.
{{champion:154}} I was made to be yours. Literally.
{{champion:22}} If all the world's on one arrow... Then i just shot you in the face...


I'm sorry. I couldn't stop.

As per the request of a few fellow summoners, I am adding a few more lines to the list that apparently everyone loves. :P

**ADDITIONS:**

{{champion:63}} You're the only one that can cool me off.
{{champion:69}} I can MAKE you fall in love with me. Just look into my eyes...
{{champion:254}} Here I am to save your day.
{{champion:45}} I AM in love with you! STOP LAUGHING!
{{champion:412}} I am the lantern to guide your way.
{{champion:37}} .....
{{champion:86}} Demacia ;) <3
{{champion:30}}  I'll be with you forever, even in death!
{{champion:119}} You are almost as perfect as me {{champion:119}}
"You are nothing more than ass, waiting to be smashed." ~{{champion:44}}

my brother walked up, saw the title of the article and said 

"Captain Teemo, reporting for booty!"

im done lol
{{champion:429}}  Do you want to be my soulbound? :)
Dating Kalista sounds legitimately terrifying. One fight and she'd be thirstin' for vengeance!
You could never dump her either. That's the crazy ex that everyone has in their past.
{{champion:53}}  doesn't need a pick up line... he just grabs that {{champion:22}}

{{champion:83}} I dig you.
(I especially dig {{champion:104}} )
Size doesn't mean everything {{champion:17}}
I am Diamond.

then she sees you're EUW kappa

MUNDO LIKE!

_Flails tongue sexfully_
I did this before I knew about Mundo...
The tongue thing or saying "MUNDO LIKE!" then doing it?
{{champion:150}}  I'm gonna throw you against a wall and pound you all night.
*Hey, Want to go out it only takes me 3 pokes before i knock you up* ~Yasuo
{{champion:37}} ...
I bet you're good at hitting skilshots, because you're Ezreal as it gets.

* {{champion:9}} "Why have a brain when I can have your heart?"

* {{champion:412}} "I may have captured your soul, but you've captured my heart." 

* Are you {{champion:115}} ? 'Cause you da bomb!

* {{champion:238}} Allow me to teach you the forbidden ways of the ninja. ;)

* Are you {{champion:245}} ? 'Cause time slows down whenever you're around.

* Are you {{champion:39}}?  'Cause you make my blade dance. ;)
Where's phreak when you need him?

Are you {{champion:79}}? Cause you got me intoxicated. 

Are you {{champion:1}}/{{champion:63}}? Cause you make me feel warm.

Are you {{champion:103}}? Cause I'm charmed.

Are you {{champion:6}}? Cause you're my last hope ..

Are you {{champion:16}}? Cause I see stars in your eyes.

Are you {{champion:89}}? Cause damn you're hot.

Are you {{champion:161}}? Cause all I see is you.

Are you {{champion:37}}? Cause your voice is music to my ears. (Yes i can hear you Sona)

Are you {{champion:4}}? Cause I'm feeling lucky.

Are you {{champion:101}}? Cause you've landed all skill shots to my heart.

Are you {{champion:53}}? Cause I wanna get closer to you.

Are you{{champion:21}}? Cause I like big bo...

Are you {{champion:41}}? Cause you make me feel fruity.

Are you {{champion:22}}? Cause you got a nice ashe.

Are you {{champion:76}}? Cause I want you to hop on me.

Are you {{champion:131}}? Cause you keep me up all night.

Are you {{champion:36}}? Cause you make me go crazy.

Are you {{champion:69}}? Cause when I look at you I get trapped in your beauty.  

Are you{{champion:5}}? Cause you sweep me off my feet.

Are you {{champion:60}}? Cause I'm trapped in your web.

Are you {{champion:54}}? Cause you rock my world!

Are you {{champion:57}}? Cause I'm a nature lover.

Are you {{champion:30}}? Cause I sing about you even after death. 

Are you {{champion:111}}? Cause you're pulling me towards you.

Are you {{champion:12}}? Cause you can't push me away no matter how hard you try.

Are you {{champion:34}}? Cause I wanna fertilize your egg. 

Are you {{champion:19}}? Cause you make me howl.

Are you {{champion:75}}? Cause I wanna give you a treat.

Are you {{champion:150}}? Cause you look gnarly.

Are you {{champion:266}}? Cause you got my blood pumping fast.

Are you {{champion:117}}? Cause you taste purple.

Are you {{champion:32}}? Cause I wanna give you a hug.

Are you {{champion:40}}? Cause you leave me breathless every time.

Are you {{champion:157}}? Cause you leave me at my last breath.

Are you {{champion:245}}? Cause your name echoes in my head every second of the day.

Are you {{champion:98}}? Cause you always got my back. 

Sorry once I started I couldn't stop. :P
If you were a ward, I'd place you in my heart <3

**Won't you be my Duo**
by_ Rito Please_


It's a beautiful day in Summoners Rift,
A beautiful day for a Duo.
Would you be mine?
Could you be mine?...

It's a Duo Q day in this bot lane,
A Duo Q day for a Carry.
Would you be mine?
Could you be mine?...

I've always wanted to have a Duo just like you.
I've always wanted to climb to top tier with you
So, let's make the most of this beautiful day.
Since we're together we might as well say:
Would you be mine?
Could you be mine?
Won't you be my Duo?
Won't you please,
Won't you please?
Please won't you be my Duo?
I wish I was {{champion:245}}, so I could fall in love with you all over again.

{{champion:37}} "R" you ready to be stunned?
{{champion:1}} "wanna play with me?" (wait, what!?)
{{champion:63}} I have a searing touch.
{{champion:86}} *Flex's arm*
{{champion:150}} Regular *cute noises*, Mega "Rawr"
{{champion:96}} Lets get sticky.
{{champion:429}} Ill pierce your heart, and bring you back.
{{champion:245}} In ten years we can say we go way back in time.
{{champion:39}} *twerks*
Will you be my Boo buff

{{champion:31}} Can I nomnomnom you?
{{champion:62}} You want to feel my my staff hitting you and taking off your armor?
{{champion:13}} You make me want to ryze up in the morning.
{{champion:55}} Get ready to be jumped on and see grey.
{{champion:268}} I'm a king of my own city/country. (Not sure about Azir's lore)
{{champion:134}} I handle balls very well. (I'm so sorry)
{{champion:63}} You look hotter than, well, me.
{{champion:157}} Don't worry even if I knock you up, I'll make you only see grey.
I may not be a {{champion:44}} main, but your eyes are truly outrageous.
